config.section.appearance.name: Appearance
config.EnabledSetting.name: Enabled
config.EnabledSetting.description: Turn the mod Alex Mus-tacular on or off.
config.SeasonalOutfitsSetting.name: Seasonal Outfits
config.SeasonalOutfitsSetting.descriptio:
Enabled: Change Alex's outfit by season.

Auto (default): Like Enabled but only when 
Seasonal Outfits by Poltergeister is installed. Otherwise disabled.

Disabled: Only shows Alex's vanilla outfit.
config.ExtraFestivalOutfitSetting.name: Extra Festival Outfits
config.ExtraFestivalOutfitSetting.descri:
Enabled: Include additional festival outfits i.e. for Spirit's Eve.

Auto (default): Like Enabled but only when 
Seasonal Outfits by Poltergeister is installed. Otherwise disabled.

Disabled: Disable this feature.
